title: The Best Christmas Gift - Gregway
description:
Greg Miller's cat defiled the best Christmas present he ever received...just defiled the hell out of it. 

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE/MERCH: http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

Leave your questions for Greg as a video response and check back every Wednesday and Friday to see what he's saying.

The Vlog playlist: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOlEpGVXWUVv1g9oZi6O95CwRHQd0ulT6

Subscribe to our channel: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

Our Merch Shop: https://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

transcript_chunks.text: what's up everybody Welcome to a gregway Travis tweets at me and asks what's the best Christmas gift I've ever received and that is an excellent question the one that I have two that I guess immediately spring to mind right number one WWF Royal Rumble on the Sega Genesis uh obviously Greg Miller is a big wrestling video game fan everybody knows that and I think I've told the story a few times but for on IGN it was one of those things where that was the first one where wrestlers just got to do their finish moves it wasn't all arcadey right like it was like Crush squeezing dink's head and I saw this at a friend's house and I was like that is just the most amazing thing I've ever seen in my life I need this game this for some reason I didn't get it right away I don't know why parents were slacking apparently or maybe just you know make make a Christmas list kind of thing but what stands out aside from the fact that this game was totally cool what stands out to me is that I got that game

apparently or maybe just you know make make a Christmas list kind of thing but what stands out aside from the fact that this game was totally cool what stands out to me is that I got that game opened it up in the Christmas morning I was so excited I was like this is great and I put it down and then I open I started opening another gift and I heard my cat vomiting and I looked over and my cat vomited right on top of WWF Royal Rumble it was the one with Lex Luger and Undertaker on the cover and everything and I was like what I say at the time but what the you know what I mean like my mom cleaned it off obviously right away and of course it was a Sega Genesis cover so it was that giant hard plastic case with the plastic over the actual inlay anyway and I was like it's no big deal like that's why they that's why they put that plastic over the top and my mom's like that's why they put the plastic over the top you think in case a cat vomits on it and I was like well played mom you will

why they that's why they put that plastic over the top and my mom's like that's why they put the plastic over the top you think in case a cat vomits on it and I was like well played mom you will never get me again uh second greatest gift I ever the one that stands out to me when I got my N64 another you know I'm obviously a big Video Game Nerd if you didn't know about it but I I it was late to the N64 train had fallen in love with the system at my friend Mike O Bran's house we go over there we play gold and ey I don't think Smash Brothers out cuz Smash Brothers was a big game over Mike's house but I think this is predates I think golden ey is what sold me on the N64 and it was one of those things where my parents hit it Christmas story style right so like I had to go downstairs for something else and then on the way back up I saw it over by the hall tree I was like Ah that's pretty good and it was like the the Sam's Club bundle right that was like in that giant hard plastic case that

else and then on the way back up I saw it over by the hall tree I was like Ah that's pretty good and it was like the the Sam's Club bundle right that was like in that giant hard plastic case that so it was like the Box golden eye I think and then an extra controller like it's pretty good mom and so the problem was we had to go to Aunt 's house for Christmas that thing so I was all depressed that I had to leave the system but they're like you can bring it with you so I brought over this all this like Nintendo stuff and I had a WWF no yeah WWF war zone with the N64 one uh which is you know looking back one of those Acclaim wrestling games that just sucked like oh hey memorize 30 different button combinations to do a stone cold stun and we're all like okay I'll do it cuz there's nothing else to do uh but I got that yeah played at anel's house all all day long and just had a wonderful wonderful time so thanks for asking Travis what my favorite Christmas gift was tell me what yours is in

to do uh but I got that yeah played at anel's house all all day long and just had a wonderful wonderful time so thanks for asking Travis what my favorite Christmas gift was tell me what yours is in the comment below everybody everybody watching this tell me what your favorite holiday gift of all time was in the comments then make sure you like the video subscribe to my Channel share it with your friends and remember that every Wednesday and Friday I'm back with another Greg way to make your day
